q: Less than two years after being released from federal prison, the Philadelphia Eagles' quarterback is making his fourth Pro Bowl appearance_ and first since serving 18 months for his role in a dogfighting operation. Saying his" heart was in Indiana," Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
